DOC.brief_summary: In pediatric patients with type 1 diabetes using subcutaneous injections; a randomised controlled trial comparing the effects of fixed carbohydrate exchanges and insulin doses to the use of variable size meals and insulin doses determined with a bolus insulin calculation card.
DOC.brief_title: Bolus Insulin Card Calculator Randomised Controlled Study
DOC.criteria: Age 11 18 years old Currently using indvidual subcutaneous injections (not CSII) HbA1c > 9.5% Serious illness
